header.title: Make your business run smoother
header.subTitle: We match Companies with top talent

services.title: StartUp up is in our DNA
services.subTitle: All services on Success

card1.title: Essential
card1.body: Looking to scale? We will match you with your C-levels for a management team that is aligned with your vision and values. We make it affordable, 5% of their gross yearly salary.

card2.title: Express
card2.body: Need an urgent hire to cover unexpected leavers? We can hire faster without compromising quality of process.

card3.title: Custom
card3.body: Count on us for your HR projects as you scale. Need an employee handbook? Are you establishing strong recruitment processes - we got you!

whyUs.title: Why Simplify-hr
whyUs.subTitle: We are obsessed with matching the best talent with their dream job

card1.title: Trust Driven.
card1.body: We gain your trust with actions over promises.

card2.title: Low and transparent fees.
card2.body: We believe that referrals for a job well done is our biggest compliment. No strings attached.

card3.title: Flexible
card3.body: Not one culture is the same. We develop a flexible plan for your individual growth goals
